events.message: The insured reported a car collision that occurred on February 28th at the downtown intersection at 5 PM.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on keywords indicating vehicle damage and collision.
Claims agent Sarah Lee assigned to handle the accident claim involving the insured person's car.
Acknowledgement sent to customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and initial review underway.
Requested police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and witness statements to proceed with investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including detailed accident photos and official police report.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence to evaluate liability and damage extent.
Investigation completed; determined insured was not at fault and vehicle requires major repair.
Proposed claim settlement covering all repair costs, rental car coverage, and minor medical bills.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt settlement proposal and clear communication.
Final approval granted for the claim, confirming full coverage of damages and associated expenses.
Issued payment to repair shop and rental agency per settlement agreement for vehicle damage.
Claim officially closed after confirmation that repairs were completed and customerâ€™s concerns addressed.
Claim documents archived in company system for records after successful closure of the auto accident case.
